Sheet1.Event: Members of the BOG arrive at the venue. HoDs and Senators assemble in the green room at the backside of  Auditorium Hall
Arrival  of  the  Chief  Guest  (He  will  be  received  by  the  Director  and ushered for robing)
The Director will introduce the Chief Guest and the members of the BOG to HoDs and Senators
Academic Procession starts from the lobby of the Auditorium
Academic Procession enters the Convocation Hall
Invocation (All will rise when the Invocation is ON)
Acting Chairman, Board of Governors declares 50th Convocation open
Distribution of degrees by the Chairman, Senate, to students (B.Tech., BS, M.Sc. (Integrated) and all dual degree (except M.Sc.-Ph.D. dual degree))
Exhortation by the Acting Chairman, Senate
Presentation of medals and prizes by the Acting Chairman, Board of Governors
Institute Report by the Director
Introduction of the Chief guest by Chairman, Board of Governors
Convocation address by Chief Guest, Mr. Natarajan Chandrasekaran
Address by the Acting Chairman, Board of Governors
National Anthem
Acting Chairman, Board of Governors declares the conclusion of Session-1 of 50th Convocation
Academic Procession leaves
Members of the BOG arrive at the venue. HoDs and Senators assemble in the green room at the backside of  Auditorium Hall
Arrival  of  the  Chief  Guest  (He  will  be  received  by  the  Director  and ushered for robing)
The Director will introduce the Chief Guest and the members of the BOG to HoDs and Senators
Academic Procession starts from the lobby of the Auditorium
Academic Procession enters the Convocation Hall
Invocation (All will rise when the Invocation is ON)
Acting Chairman, Board of Governors (Prof. G. C. Tripathi) declares the commencement of Session - 2 of the 50th Convocation open

Distribution of degrees to students by the Chairman, Senate (Ph.D., M.Tech., MS (Research), MBA, M. Des., M.Sc. (2-Year), M.Sc.-Ph. D (Dual Degree)). Names of the students of PGDEXVLM who will be convocated at IIM Kolkata will be announced.
Exhortation by the Chairman, Senate
Presentation of medals and prizes by the Acting Chairman, Board of Governors
Presentation of citation (Honoris Causa) to Prof. Mriganka Sur
Award of Doctor of Science (Honoris Causa) to Prof. Mriganka Sur
Acceptance speech by Prof. Mriganka Sur
Presentation of citation (Honoris Causa) to Ms. P. T. Usha
Award of Doctor of Science (Honoris Causa) to Ms. P. T. Usha
Acceptance speech by Ms. P. T. Usha
Presentation of citation (Honoris Causa) to Prof. Ajay Kumar Sood
Award of Doctor of Science (Honoris Causa) to Prof. Ajay Kumar Sood
Video Clipping of Acceptance speech by Prof. Ajay Kumar Sood
Presentation of citation (Honoris Causa) to Prof. M S Swaminathan
Award of Doctor of Science (Honoris Causa) to Prof. M S Swaminathan
Video Clipping of Acceptance speech by Prof. M S Swaminathan
Institute Report by the Director
Introduction of the Chief guest by the Acting Chairman, Board of Governors
Convocation address by Chief Guest, Dr. Clayton Daniel Mote, Jr.
Address by the Acting Chairman, Board of Governors
National Anthem
Chairman, Board of Governors declares the conclusion of the 50th Convocation
Academic Procession leaves
